title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education                Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education        NPS Collection       Facility Hours Open everyday, Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day weekend. 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Open Monday - Saturday. Closed Sundays in the winter. 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Street Address 100 North Lake Street Gary, IN 46403 (219) 395-1821 GPS Coordinates 41.606392, -87.268604 (Decimal Degrees)       Visitor Activities  Hike the incredible Miller Woods trail system. The center has interactive exhibits to explore. Families can enjoy the Nature Play Zone.  Fun Facts  The center is named after U.S. Senator Paul H. Douglas from Illinois, who was instrumental in the creation of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore.
